item.title: Projecting with Python [GIS, Python]
item.author: ck_howard@yahoo.com (Chris Howard)
item.description: My Introduction to GIS with Python Python is a powerful tool in the GIS world, so I wanted to get a little bit of practice with it. I have had a lot of fun working with the Global Terrorism Database so I figured I would go from its CSV format to one that is better-supported by GIS â€” the shapefile. The dataset contains information related to terrorist attacks, including attack locations.
